channel.title: Silabs items(reward if helped)
channel.description:
I don't know what happend, but now my NPC that gives me a skillcape when I get 99 gives me different items. Why is this? How can I get my skillcapes and shit back? And I didn't change anything.
I also heard people talking about the Item ID's changed, if that helps any.

item.title: Silabs items(reward if helped)
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

That would effect silab because she has one simple code…

[code]import java.io.*;
public class ItemDef {

public static int count;
public int lastoffset;
public int length = 0;
public String lastname;
public void readDef(ByteStream class22_sub9, int i) {
if (i == 0){ //here is the bulk of my crappy splitter.
length = (class22_sub9.caret - lastoffset);
if(name != null ){
try{
FileOutputStream data = new FileOutputStream(“Item/”+count+++".dat");
byte b[] = new byte[length];
System.arraycopy(class22_sub9.getData(), lastoffset, b, 0, length);
data.write(b);
data.close();
}catch(Exception e){
System.out.println(e);
}
name = null;

		}
		lastoffset = lastoffset + length;
					
	} // end of my bullshit splitter
    if (i == 1) {
        modelID = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 2) {
        name = class22_sub9.readString();
        	System.out.println(name+" "+count);
    } else if (i == 4) {
        anInt2847 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 5) {
        anInt2835 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 6) {
        anInt2827 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 7) {
        anInt2854 = class22_sub9.readShort();
        if (anInt2854 > 32767)
            anInt2854 -= 0x10000;
    } else if (i == 8) {
        anInt2858 = class22_sub9.readShort();
        if (anInt2858 > 32767)
            anInt2858 -= 0x10000;
    } else if (i == 11) {
        stackable = 1;
    } else if (i == 12) {
        value = class22_sub9.readInteger();
    } else if (i == 16) {
        isMembers = true;
    } else if (i == 23) {
        anInt2834 = class22_sub9.readShort();
        anInt2856 = class22_sub9.readUnByte();
    } else if (i == 24) {
        anInt2841 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 25) {
        anInt2880 = class22_sub9.readShort();
        anInt2845 = class22_sub9.readUnByte();
    } else if (i == 26) {
        anInt2829 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i >= 30 && i < 35) {
        worldOptions[i - 30] = class22_sub9.readString();
        if (worldOptions[i - 30].equalsIgnoreCase("Hidden"))
            worldOptions[i - 30] = null;
    } else if (i >= 35 && i < 40) {
        possessiveOptions[-35 + i] = class22_sub9.readString();
    } else if (i == 40) {
        int j = class22_sub9.readUnByte();
        oldColour = new short[j];
        newColour = new short[j];
        for (int k = 0; k < j; k++) {
            oldColour[k] = (short) class22_sub9.readShort();
            newColour[k] = (short) class22_sub9.readShort();
        }
    } else if (i == 78) {
        anInt2859 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 79) {
        anInt2844 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 90) {
        anInt2869 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 91) {
        anInt2864 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 92) {
        anInt2855 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 93) {
        anInt2837 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 95) {
        anInt2828 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 97) {
        anInt2865 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 98) {
        anInt2874 = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i >= 100 && i < 110) {
        if (stackedModelTable == null) {
            stackedModelTable = new int[10];
            stackSizes = new int[10];
        }
        stackedModelTable[i - 100] = class22_sub9.readShort();
        stackSizes[i - 100] = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 110) {
        modelScaleX = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 111) {
        modelScaleZ = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 112) {
        modelScaleY = class22_sub9.readShort();
    } else if (i == 113) {
        anInt2872 = class22_sub9.readRawByte();
    } else if (i == 114) {
        anInt2873 = class22_sub9.readRawByte() * 5;
    } else if (i == 115) {
        capeTeam = class22_sub9.readUnByte();
    }
}


int anInt2827;
int anInt2828;
 int anInt2829;
int capeTeam;
 int anInt2834;
int anInt2835;
int anInt2837;
int stackSizes[];
boolean isMembers;

int anInt2841;
int anInt2844;
int anInt2845;
int modelScaleY;
int anInt2847;
String worldOptions[] = new String[10];
int anInt2854;
int anInt2855;
int anInt2856;
int modelScaleX;
int anInt2858;
int anInt2859;
int modelScaleZ;
String possessiveOptions[] = new String[10];
int itemID;
int anInt2864;
int anInt2865;
int stackedModelTable[];
int anInt2869;
short newColour[];
int anInt2872;
int anInt2873;
int anInt2874;
short oldColour[];
int stackable;
int value;
int anInt2880;
int modelID;
String name;
}

public class ByteStream {
private int length;

private final byte[] data;

public int caret = 0;

 public ByteStream(byte[] pData){
     this.data = pData;
 }

public int getLength() {
	return length;
}

public byte[] getData() {
	return data;
}



public String readString() {
    String s = "";
    int b;
    while((b = readByte()) != 0){
		s += (char)b;
	}
    return s;
}


public void readBytes(byte abyte0[], int i, int j)
{
    for(int k = j; k < j + i; k++)
        abyte0[k] = readByte();

}



 private byte readByte() {
	try{
		return data[caret++];
	} catch (Exception _ex) {return -1;}
}




public void skip(int x) {
	caret += x;
}


public int remaining() {
	return data.length - caret;
}


public int readShort() {
    return ((readByte() & 0xff) << 8) + (readByte() & 0xff);
}

public int readInteger() {
    return (0xff & readByte()) + (((0xff & readByte()) << 8) + (((0xff & readByte()) << 16) + (0xff000000 & readByte() << 24)));
}

public int readUnByte() {
    return readByte() & 0xff;
}
public int readRawByte() {
    return readByte();
}

}[/code]

She’s making a deal with jagex… you think she can do all that work lmao…
